attributes.action: Give full employment rights to workers from day one
attributes.background:
Why should companies be able to unfairly dismiss an employee without that emloyee being able to take them to tribunal if they haven't worked for more than two years?

People get unfairly dismissed in the first two years, yet have no legal recourse.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/615564

If you'd like other employment rights to be extended to day one, you could start a new petition that sets this out.
